p: On CDK2, the tested compounds showed potent sub-micromolar inhibitory activity with IC 50 ranged from 37.80 to 177 nM in comparison to that of the used reference standard (IC 50 = 38.50 nM). The bromo isatin derivative 5d showed the most potent inhibitory activity with IC 50 of 37.80 nM comparable to that of staurosporine. Compounds 5 b, 5c and 5f showed two-digit nanomolar inhibitory activity with IC 50 of 52.50, 85.40 and 52.80, respectively ( Table 2).
